attributes.action: define in law a public servants responsibility of truth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We choose to remind the Prime Minister that he and his colleagues are public servants.

We believe that there should be a penalty in law when public servants mislead us. These are people we have elected on the basis of trust to represent us.

To do otherwise, to lie to us, to mislead us is a betrayal of that trust at the most basic and abusive level.

Parents who abuse their children are punished - so should public servants who abuse those in their charge.

We petition the Prime Minister to define in law the punishments and penalties for deception and misleading the public.

We believe as those who elected you this is the very least we deserve.
